pull.title: doc: Include static members in Doxygen
pull.body: This makes our Doxygen output more useful by generating them for static members.

events.body:
ACK 84ad4d2b9d80dcbfa9780984bc7c9cbe1f7b3f60

Tested by generating the Doxygen docs for master (f373beebbcc0c7d1160e02dc638a00b3e6831d98) and 84ad4d2b9d80dcbfa9780984bc7c9cbe1f7b3f60

master:
![master](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/863730/60763742-7426d880-a0ad-11e9-959c-5a567570a6e6.png)

#16347:
![16347](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/863730/60763744-7ee16d80-a0ad-11e9-9739-e0e93e68c1c2.png)
@laanwj Could you take a quick look here, given this will affect https://dev.visucore.com/bitcoin/doxygen/.

I don't see why not
I wonder what my original rationale was for not setting it, but might have missed the option, or maybe it didn't exist back then.

ACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16347/commits/84ad4d2b9d80dcbfa9780984bc7c9cbe1f7b3f60
I've regenerated the documentation, should include static members now
Thanks. I've always wondered why so much was missing from the doxygen
